name: Cold Harvest
description:
Several weeks before the New Year, the main character (Robert) has a dream in which he tries to seduce a beautiful girl who looks just like a model from the cover of a popular magazine. For most young men his age, this is nothing special, but not for Robert, who has never had dreams before.

Moreover, after the tragic events that happened to him during his high school years, Robert suffers from regular episodes of headaches, intensified by visual contact with girls. This illness, according to doctors, is abnormal and can cause unconsciousness or even death.
Escaping from female companionship, doctor visits, and constant headaches, he isolates himself in a small apartment fortunately inherited from a distant relative.
After spending three years in it as a hermit, practicing daily self-control and meditation, Rob realizes that now he is in even greater mortal danger, since he cannot hide from girls in his sleep.

The whole thing leads to Robert deciding to leave the apartment to buy his best friend (Mr. White, the cat) a last gift, for his upcoming cat birthday. But things don't go as planned when he loses his wallet. With no money for coffee or food, Rob, without understanding how, takes a part-time job as an overnight delivery man.

While delivering orders, he will face many obstacles consisting of beautiful girls who, for reasons unknown to him, literally lose their minds and become obsessed with the desire to seduce him.
At the same time, something sinister, which does not belong to this time or place, begins to reveal itself more intensively as the protagonist's headaches become more severe.


Cold Harvest is a combination of visual novel and adventure with dating elements and a small open world.

• free movement around the city
• interaction with characters and objects
• the change of night and day
• transfer of objects between locations and their collection
• solving riddles and puzzles
• dynamically developing plot
• mini games built into the gameplay
• romantic relationships with many girls
• horror and action scenes

In the game, in addition to the main character, you can play as various secondary characters whose storylines run parallel to the main story, this will allow you to immerse yourself more deeply in the incredible story of the guy with deer antlers and understand the motivation for their actions.
